Package com.github.jnstockley.addressbookrest

Class PersonController

java.lang.Object
com.github.jnstockley.addressbookrest.PersonController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/people")
public class PersonController
extends java.lang.Object
A RESTful web service with full CRUD support for the Person table Supports GET, PUT, POST, DELETE
Version:
3.2
Author:
jackstockley

  • Method Details

    • getAllPeople

      @GetMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAllPeople()
      Gets all the people stored in the database and returns them
      Returns:
      A list of people

    • getPersonByID

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getPersonByID​(@PathVariable int id)
      Gets a singular person from the database based on the id passed and returns it
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the person on the database
      Returns:
      A person object

    • updatePerson

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity updatePerson​(@PathVariable int id, @RequestBody com.github.jnstockley.addressbook.Person person)
      Updates a user specified person at the id passed
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the person to be updated
      person - The new person to update the current person
      Returns:
      A person object

    • insertPerson

      @PostMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity insertPerson​(@RequestBody com.github.jnstockley.addressbook.Person person)
      Inserts a new person into the database
      Parameters:
      person - New person to be added
      Returns:
      New person added

    • deletePerson

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity deletePerson​(@PathVariable int id)
      Removes a user specified person from the database
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the person to be removed
      Returns:
      True if person removed otherwise false
